parameter.name: defaultHeight
parameter.label: Default Height
parameter.description: Defines the default height in pixels for the chart to build.

parameter.name: defaultWidth
parameter.label: Default Width
parameter.description: Defines the default width in pixels for the chart to build.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.label: Scale
parameter.description: Defines the scale to apply to the requested chart height (0.5 to divide by 2 for example).

parameter.name: maxWidth
parameter.label: Maximum Width
parameter.description: Defines the maximum width in pixels for the chart to build.
